name: Disharmonia
description:
Disharmonia is an adventurous exploration game with several endings. You will play for Tony, you will discover special places in your reality and beyond. You will explore different endings of the whole game, you will stick to the storyline or you will not stick to the storyline. your decision will change the story and development of the game. You will try to find the end in a never ending game.

But as you explore, the meaning and story of the whole game is slowly beginning to emerge.
